channel.title: Runepoon! Great server!
channel.description:
[left][u]Runepoon community[/u]
Runepoon has a very nice and friendly community that is always there to help you out. We strive for direct player reflecion, this means that players are the ones that help each other out. This creates the best gaming situation possible.
[u]Management[/u]
First I'd like to start off with telling you about how our management works, we strive for the bestgameplay for everyone - we care about what people say and we listen to them. Only because of this Runepoon has the chance to strive. You are what can make us big, without players we would be close to nowhere. Players are your friends, you just need to know how to handle them. Due to this big support of our players we have fully fixed up our wilderness, we gave them a great platform for clans to build off to improve clan community, we have a great system that does not allow Pjing or ragging in certain zones because - let's be honest, it pisses people off. But at the same time it improves the single clans to be more active. We are thinking of solutions, 24/7. That is what makes us #1 - We are ALWAYS ahead of the rest.
[u]Runepoon fits YOU.[/u]
Runepoon was designed to entertain every type of player. We have different game modes where you can choose how you'd like to play. Are you an oldschool lover? This is your lucky day! The oldschool game mode will perfectly entertain you, if you are more of a newschool player you can select the newer graphical game mode. So if you either are a person who likes challenging gameplay or someone who just likes to enter our highly populated wilderness straight after logging in Runepoon is the place for you.
[u]Ideal (What we strive for)[/u]
Our ideal is maximum entertainment. We are not in this business for the money, we are in this to give YOU the best entertainment. Your enjoyment of the game is what we strive for. You do not have to pay for anything because that simply goes against our ideal. Everything is free to enjoy! You have the option to purchase items, but you don't have to pay to wear specific items or to get privileges on other players!
[size=x-large][color=#FF0000][u][b]Runepoon features![/b][/u][/color][/size]
~Fast Exp Rate!~ ~Flawless Pking~ ~Unique Home~ ~All working curses~ ~lottery~ ~all skills working~ ~Summoning~ ~Donator Options~ 1.Get an Instant Slayer task while in Gwd dungeon! 2. Switch to any spellbook at anytime! 3. Teleport to the Sexy Donator zone 4. Extremes 5. Three new shops (in donatorzone you can choose to reset some stats) ~Buy donator status for $5 and get 5pts from there each pt is $1.~ ~donator Chest (cost 1 pt)~ ~donator chest contains random rewards (colored whips-phats-primal-more)~ ~all Dragons~ ~::commands~ for help ~All spec weapons working~ ~custom Dungeoneering~ ~Full Pernix, Torva, Virtus~ ~all dungeoneering rewards encluding chaotics and primals~ ~full Primal, Celestial, Sagittarian~ ~friendly staff~ [b][size=x-large]~Warning: Addictive!~[/b]
Wanna give it a try?? http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Runepoon
We are proud of this...

item.title: Runepoon! Great server!
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Stunninhigh, post:17, topic:470062”][quote author=TimeRS3 link=topic=587427.msg4168543#msg4168543 date=1353979154]
Same stuff I always see
[/quote]

And that shit you advertise is any different or any good at that? NOT! LOL![/quote]
Not sure if serious… are you even attempting to compare this server with his server? His server is blatantly superior. For one example, he didn’t download a source, change the name, and then put it online. And this is coming from someone who has never even logged onto his server.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepoon! Great server!
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

lavamaker7:

We have fully working barrows, barrows effects also, 10 different bosses with decent drops and drop rates (Lahkrahnaz, Avatar of destruction, Giant sea queen, giant sea snake, gwds, kbd, dags, nomad, and TDS, corp), strykeworms, working warrior guild for defenders upto flame burst, umm… custom dungeoneering with torva pernix and virtus

I guarantee most of that was already there from the source you leeched, or you took them straight from tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepoon! Great server!
item.dc:creator: @Tmesis Tmesis
item.description:
@Tmesis wrote:

You shouldn’t claim greatness.

It looks like all the models have had the texture/shading removed (yuk). All I see is a bunch of shops with every best item available to buy (what do you offer players to obtain whilst slaying or skilling?), and if there is nothing else to show except all your shops I can’t imagine there is anything else to do on your server except go shopping.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepoon! Great server!
item.dc:creator: @lavamaker7 lavamaker7
item.description:
@lavamaker7 wrote:

[left]Runepoon community

Runepoon has a very nice and friendly community that is always there to help you out. We strive for direct player reflecion, this means that players are the ones that help each other out. This creates the best gaming situation possible.

Management

First I’d like to start off with telling you about how our management works, we strive for the bestgameplay for everyone - we care about what people say and we listen to them. Only because of this Runepoon has the chance to strive. You are what can make us big, without players we would be close to nowhere. Players are your friends, you just need to know how to handle them. Due to this big support of our players we have fully fixed up our wilderness, we gave them a great platform for clans to build off to improve clan community, we have a great system that does not allow Pjing or ragging in certain zones because - let’s be honest, it pisses people off. But at the same time it improves the single clans to be more active. We are thinking of solutions, 24/7. That is what makes us #1 - We are ALWAYS ahead of the rest.

Runepoon fits YOU.

Runepoon was designed to entertain every type of player. We have different game modes where you can choose how you’d like to play. Are you an oldschool lover? This is your lucky day! The oldschool game mode will perfectly entertain you, if you are more of a newschool player you can select the newer graphical game mode. So if you either are a person who likes challenging gameplay or someone who just likes to enter our highly populated wilderness straight after logging in Runepoon is the place for you.

Ideal (What we strive for)

Our ideal is maximum entertainment. We are not in this business for the money, we are in this to give YOU the best entertainment. Your enjoyment of the game is what we strive for. You do not have to pay for anything because that simply goes against our ideal. Everything is free to enjoy! You have the option to purchase items, but you don’t have to pay to wear specific items or to get privileges on other players!

[size=x-large][color=#FF0000]Runepoon features![/color][/size]

~Fast Exp Rate!~
~Flawless Pking~
~Unique Home~
~All working curses~
~lottery~
~all skills working~
~Summoning~
~Donator Options~
1.Get an Instant Slayer task while in Gwd dungeon!
2. Switch to any spellbook at anytime!
3. Teleport to the Sexy Donator zone
4. Extremes
5. Three new shops
(in donatorzone you can choose to reset some stats)

there each pt is $1.~

~::commands~ for help

~custom Dungeoneering~

~full Primal, Celestial, Sagittarian~
